name: Decorous Harmony
title: Yun Jin: Decorous Harmony
in_play_description: When Yun Jin, who has this card equipped, is on the field, and you trigger Flying Cloud Flag Formation: If you have no cards in your Hand, this Skill deals +2 additional DMG.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Yun Jin to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Yun Jin, equip this card.
After Yun Jin equips this card, immediately use Cliffbreaker's Banner.
When Yun Jin, who has this card equipped, is on the field, and you trigger Flying Cloud Flag Formation: If you have no cards in your Hand, this Skill deals +2 additional DMG.
(You must have Yun Jin in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
